feed.title: SAP Community - HCM (Human Capital Management)
feed.subtitle: HCM (Human Capital Management) Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Infoporter Job Info - Hire date = FTSD
entry.content:
Hi,

Has anyone used Infoporter to migrate Job info into EC before?

I'm using it for the first time and it works except for the scenario when FTSD is the same as hire date.

In that scenario it gives me this error

You cannot create a job information record without the recruit record
for user xxxx. The first job information record must be the recruit
record.

I have configured the additional events as follows for the Hire Event

01 = event reason HIRNEW

Based on the SAP help document, it says here that it should follow the action type configured in the table.  Which if so it should be sending a HIRNEW event.  But based on the log its sending an evventReason DATACONV eventhough hire date is the same as FTSD date

entry.title: EHP5 to EHP6 upgrade (SAP HR)
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We are going to upgrade Ehp 5 to EHp6 . What are the SAP HCM side pre-requisites/to be performed.   If is there any standard process or guide . Kindly help me on this.

Regards,Jaya

entry.title: SAP HCM: Org. Unit cannot be assigned to Position (PA30)
entry.content:
I have created some new Org. Units and accordingly made relations:

1. Position to Person

2. Position to Org. Unit

BUT only Position / Person relation is visible at PA30 >>> Org. Assignment infotype. However, Org Unit is showing 00000000.

Regards,

Jamil

entry.title: Technical Error in PCC
entry.content:
Hi,

While adding the policies to the policy configuration in PCC, I am getting an error message as "The OData request processing has been abnormally terminated. If you use SAP S/4HANA Cloud, please create an incident. Otherwise, if \"Runtime Error\" is not initial, launch ADT feed \"Runtime Errors\" or transaction ST22 / SM21 (system log analysis) for details and analysis." Can anyone suggest how to resolve the issue.

Thank you

Swapna

entry.title: Issue with User Visibility in People Picker on Manage Flexible Workflow Application
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are currently in the process of configuring a workflow within the Manage Flexible Workflow application. However, we are encountering an issue where no users are visible in the People Picker field. Despite ensuring that all required prerequisites as per the KBA mentioned below have been met, we are still unable to see any users listed.

0002824240 - No users available in People picker of Manage workflow application

0002869055 - No users available in Manage Workflows app - SAP S/4HANA

We have followed the standard setup guidelines and checked the user assignments, but the problem persists. Could anyone from the community suggest what could be causing this issue or any troubleshooting steps we might have missed?

entry.title: Attendance Punching Machine database data reading
entry.content:
I have multiple attendance machines that store fingerprints in a SQL Server database.
I plan to connect SAP with SQL Server using a DBCON connection and develop an ABAP program to read and insert records into the TEVEN table or a Z-table.
Is this approach correct? Should I use BAPIs to update TEVEN or write directly? Any advice on job scheduling and duplicate record handling?

entry.title: read infotype 0015 with RFC function module
entry.content:
Hi,

for PA0008 I found fm HR_ECM_UI_VIEW_SALARY_DATA.

Module must RFC enabled, I collect data outside from SAP with Data Service.

Now I need to read the 0015 to get the addition salary. Some values are direct in this table but in Germany we have e.g. T-Zug A salary ( One-off payments depending on tariff ) , this value is 0 in table and should be e.g. 500 €, shown in tx PA20.

 

Thx

entry.title: ABSENCE CARRY OVER
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I want to carry forward the leftover quota balance of quota type 15 to 16, for which I wrote attached two PCR's (ZQEC - To Carry forward the balance on 31st Dec & ZQEU - To update the leftover balance on 1st Jan) and placed both the PCR's as shown in the attachment (Schema).

In the update PCR (ZQEU), I have used the syntax function as HRS=FR15C, which should actually carry forward the leftover balance, however, in my case it is carry forwarding the quota balance that was used (Quota Deduction value) within the current year (TimeType ZQEC = -16, the deduction value, instead of 104 hrs (120-16))

Kindly please have a look at the configuration and suggest me where it's going wrong.

Many thanks in advance.

Sai

entry.title: CAT2 variant not displaying for users
entry.content: A variant was created in CAT2 to include a new column "Project Description". Variant was created and saved as "Project Description" in administrator but the users are not able to see it.  SAP Notes 2066612 & 2442592 have already been referenced and provide no solution.

entry.title: How to move data from TEVEN to RT table in Payroll?
entry.content:
hello Expert , I am abap developer

I'm working on Payroll schema, and I want to include time data from TEVEN table (e.g. attendance or absence hours) into the RT (Results Table).

I know TEVEN is processed in Time Evaluation (TM00), but is there a way to transfer certain TEVEN data (like total hours) into Payroll RT using schema logic or a custom operation?

entry.title: Custom Navigation with User ID as Parameter
entry.content:
Hi All,

I would like to add a custom button to the SAP SuccessFactors Employee Profile. When clicked, the button should redirect the user to an external website, with the user's User ID passed as a URL parameter.

This functionality is intended to enable seamless integration between SuccessFactors and the external system.

Please let me know how we can proceed with this implementation.

Thank you.

entry.title: Roth limits for Employee Contributions
entry.content:
Hello,

I know that the limits for 401K/pre-tax savings plans are provided by SAP annually (updates T511P table). Can anyone share their system set up to limit employee contributions for Roth (after tax) plans?? I've set the plans up for IT0169, but the system is allowing contributions over the 2025 limits. Did you all use limit on deductions through IMG, Badi, or some other way?

"cannot change as it is released"

when I am trying to un release it, then it is throwing error.

If so, can we embed our function module in it?

entry.title: "Error getting query preview" in Canvas Report while querying Employee Time by Advance Reporting
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I've try to create a Time-Off Transaction Report in SuccessFactors hence I try to use the Canvas report by Published Data Table and using Advance Reporting tool and select Time Management -> Employee Time but when try to look at Results tab it is showing "Error getting query preview". Although, this same issue doesn't persist with another query such as Time Account Detail. Please kindly support how to resolve the issue. Thanks in advance

entry.title: Calculated columns: How to use TOTEXT for parameter with both string and number values
entry.content:
We are currently trying to set up a calculated column in SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics to determine eligibility for level progression using logic similar to the following
IF([Current Level] = "B3" AND [TIME_IN_LEVEL_MONTHS] >= 50 AND [TOTAL_SENIORITY_MONTHS] >= 150,
"B2",
[Current Level]
)


When referencing the parameter in the formula for [Current Level] , the error appears: Formula could not be computed: Function "=" expects parameters 1 and 2 to be of compatible types (found "Number" vs. "String"). Please complete or rewrite the formula.
--> The current level is recognized sometimes as text (A, A3, A3, ...) and sometimes as numbers (1, 2, 3, ...) which is true, the values can have both type of content.

To work around this, we attempted to use the TOTEXT() function to normalize the data type, but it seems this formula is more designed for dates? e.g. TOTEXT([Current Level#External Name]) like TOTEXT("A") "A" results in '17833043'

 


Could you advise on:

How to consistently treat [Current Level] as a text field in formulas?
Whether there’s a recommended approach for handling mixed-type fields in People Analytics?

Thank you in advance for your support.



Documentation reviewed:

  • https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PEOPLE_ANALYTICS/dad69084edb947e98ebede671ecd26f0/190ee023528640478551fd4054e183bb.html?locale=en-US&state=PRODUCTION&version=2505
  • https://me.sap.com/notes/3204317

entry.title: Error en delegación de autorizaciones en portal de SAP
entry.content:
Hola ,

La empleada 11382 ha delegado las aprobaciones del portal en su manager 30780 ya que está de baja de maternidad. Al recibir la delegación de las aprobaciones, el manager 30780 deja de ver las peticiones de su subordinado directo 11382, no pudiendo realizar gestiones como lactancia, ... en el portal 

Regards

Sandeep Turkar

Regards,
Neeraj.

entry.title: Technical wagetype config
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts, 

I have business requirement to display amount of 3 Wage types in to technical wage types.

I have created a custom WT Z101 using standard procedure, with processing class 1=0; PC 10=0; and PC 20= 3

i have write schema as well to show in RT: 

 

i have insert this in subschema XAL9 Factoring and Storage:

q.1 this technical WT is not displaying in RT table or payroll. what is the problem in this config?

q2. is it possible that we can add 3 amounts in single technical wage type through standard. or i need to create 3 different technical wage types for 3 different wage types.

SAP SuccessFactors HCM Core HCM (Human Capital Management) HCM Payroll SAP S/4HANA

entry.title: RAP Solution to update Absences (Infotype 2001)
entry.content:
In the context of Clean Core, we have started using RAP for all our API solutions. We have a requirement to update Absences (2001), Presence (2002) and Substitutions (2003). 

Currently known function modules to update Infotypes are "HR_MAINTAIN_MASTERDATA" and "HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION". 

Unfortunately these function modules are not allowed in RAP since they make use of the statement CALL DIALOG.

Looked into the successor of "HR_MAINTAIN_MASTERDATA", CL_HRPA_MASTERDATA_BL. I do not find enough examples about how to use it for Infotypes 2001/2/3. 

Has anyone tried to work with Absences using RAP?
